name: Last MEOW (itch)
description:
Made for the "Ludum Dare 32" in 72 hours, the theme was an unconventional weapon.

Defend the cat island launching thousand of cats and using the last feline technologies.

WASD to move ( dont forget to double jump)

1 to 8 to choose weapons

Cycle weapons with Q and E

Aim with mouse, click to shoot
